item.title: Help plz posted this befor dident get help
item.dc:creator: @sandboxpvp sandboxpvp
item.description:
@sandboxpvp wrote:

ok so i wanted to add where when u recharge your prayer u get your spec for your wepons back when u recharge and this is what i got so far and someone was helping me but then they stoped helping me here what we got done so far

[code]}

                    break;*/
                    
            case 409:
            case 4859:
            case 2640:
                    if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) {
                            c.startAnimation(645);
                            c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
                            c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points.");
                            c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
                            c.specAmount = 10.0;
                    } else {
                            c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points.");
                    }
                    break;[/code]

Read full topic
